item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Fantastic.Four.2005.1080p.DSNP.WEB-DL.DDP5.1.H.264-Samuel
item.description:
Fantastic Four

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Alternate Artwork 4 | Alternate Artwork 5 | Alternate Artwork 6 | Poster 1 | Poster 2 | Key Art


2005 • 1h 45m
Science Fiction, Super Hero, Action-Adventure

Description
Transformed into superheroes after surviving a disaster in space, The Fantastic Four struggle to reconcile their powers, responsibilities, and relationships as a dysfunctional family. Overcoming their personal conflicts, they finally join forces to defeat Dr. Doom, the malevolent, metallic embodiment of their treacherous former patron.
Click to expand...

Click to expand...
More Information
Long Description:
Transformed into superheroes after surviving a disaster in space, The Fantastic Four struggle to reconcile their powers, responsibilities, and relationships as a dysfunctional family. Overcoming their personal conflicts, they finally join forces to defeat Dr. Doom, the malevolent, metallic embodiment of their treacherous former patron.

Some flashing lights sequences or patterns may affect photosensitive viewers.

item.title: 【Music Videos】PACK - MTV Madonna - It's That Girl - Remake (fan Made)
item.description:
Remake: VHS Promo https://www.discogs.com/release/6628524-Madonna-Its-That-Girl

​
1. Holiday
2. Lucky Star
3. Like A Virgin
4. Material Girl
5. Intro The Groove (Soundtrack From "Desperately Seeking Susan")
6. Angel
7. Dress You Up (Live from The Virgin Tour 1985)
8. Borderline
9. Live To Tell (Soundtrack From "Fire With Fire")
10. Papa Don't Preach
11. True Blue (Remix)
12. Open Your Heart (Remix Edit With Original Video Intro)
13. La Isla Bonita (Remix)
14. Who's That Girl (Soundtrack From "The Who's That Girl")​

Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
